item.description: 《鹅作剧》再次登顶 获GDC年度游戏 只狼、死亡搁浅落败 The Game Developers Choice Awards winners are:Best AudioControl(Remedy Entertainment/505 Games)Best DebutZA/UM (Disco Elysium)Best DesignBaba is You (Hempuli)Best Mobile GameWhat the Golf? (Triband/The Label Limited)Innovation AwardBaba is You (Hempuli)Best NarrativeDisco Elysium (ZA/UM)Best TechnologyControl (Remedy Entertainment/505 Games)Best Visual ArtControl (Remedy Entertainment/505 Games)Best VR/AR GameVader Immortal (ILMxLAB & Oculus Studios/Disney)Audience AwardSky: Children of the Light (thatgamecompany)Game of the YearUntitled Goose Game (House House/Panic)Pioneer AwardRoberta WilliamsAmbassador AwardKate Edwards
item.content:encoded:
海岸线zjl:
《鹅作剧》再次登顶 获GDC年度游戏 只狼、死亡搁浅落败
The Game Developers Choice Awards winners are:Best AudioControl(Remedy Entertainment/505 Games)Best DebutZA/UM (Disco Elysium)Best DesignBaba is You (Hempuli)Best Mobile GameWhat the Golf? (Triband/The Label Limited)Innovation AwardBaba is You (Hempuli)Best NarrativeDisco Elysium (ZA/UM)Best TechnologyControl (Remedy Entertainment/505 Games)Best Visual ArtControl (Remedy Entertainment/505 Games)Best VR/AR GameVader Immortal (ILMxLAB & Oculus Studios/Disney)Audience AwardSky: Children of the Light (thatgamecompany)Game of the YearUntitled Goose Game (House House/Panic)Pioneer AwardRoberta WilliamsAmbassador AwardKate Edwards

KnightHart:
众望所归

zhaijiadehuiye:
为什么它得啊？ 不明白 感觉就是个小品游戏啊

ro4074:
每次这个游戏进入我的视线时都有新的名字，什么“未名之鹅”“成鹅”“如鹅”之类的

Kidinthe21st:
-- 来自 有消息提醒的 Stage1官方 Android客户端

Kidinthe21st:
你直接在标题上加“死亡搁浅”“只狼”一奖未得，效果会好一点
-- 来自 能搜索的 Stage1官方 Android客户端

pgain2004:
ro4074 发表于 2020-3-26 09:49
每次这个游戏进入我的视线时都有新的名字，什么“未名之鹅”“成鹅”“如鹅”之类的 ...
最近都是“鹅作剧”啊，我觉得这翻译很棒

小命4:
这游戏能玩多长时间

jimclack:
野鸡成了

病態極端:
zhaijiadehuiye 发表于 2020-3-26 08:15
为什么它得啊？ 不明白 感觉就是个小品游戏啊
可能沒人覺得2019有遊戲值得年度遊戲
同時，GDC評委都是開發者 => 2019的遊戲做得還沒我做得好

cjcjason:
《鹅作剧过誉了吗》
